channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Ok, this is my first server ever, so I don't know much :P
I changed [b]MY[/b] Charater rights to 3. Saved. Copiled. Then I Ran it (runserver), started up Moparscape, and went on.
As soon as I logged in, I realized that I didnt have my "yellow" crown. So I logged out, and checked My player rights. Rights set back to "0".
Can someone please help me with this problem?! I need to be an "owner"!
Thank you!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

yeah thats the problem it will work then if you do what i said.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Byty Byty
item.description:
@Byty wrote:

OK, I am using testscape. Thanks for your help. Ill try it out right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

if you are using testscape source, go into client.java and hold ctrl + f, search for “player rights = 0” it will come up your name, next to it put 3, save compile then run and it should work then

Read full topic
